analysis.description:
JadeCoin.allocatedJadeResearchSnapshots (/unique_chucks/21/0xe0b98baccebfa83a91e9d8ea3c1cb93a96846306.sol#154-155) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- increasePlayersJadeProduction (/unique_chucks/21/0xe0b98baccebfa83a91e9d8ea3c1cb93a96846306.sol#198-206)
	- reducePlayersJadeProduction (/unique_chucks/21/0xe0b98baccebfa83a91e9d8ea3c1cb93a96846306.sol#206-222)

JadeCoin.balanceOfUnclaimed (/unique_chucks/21/0xe0b98baccebfa83a91e9d8ea3c1cb93a96846306.sol#183-193) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lSave > 0 && lSave < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/21/0xe0b98baccebfa83a91e9d8ea3c1cb93a96846306.sol#188-190)
